name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/AvGhOUlARk

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Taiwanese audience sang "Blue Sky, White Sun, Red Earth"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Taiwanese players won the gold medal in the men's doubles badminton final at the Paris Olympics on August 4. The flag of Chinese Taipei was slowly raised at the scene and many Taiwanese sang the national flag anthem of the Republic of China.
Chinese netizens responded, "If Taiwan wins, it's also China's win" and "It's okay, first and second are both Chinese."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Taiwanese people celebrate this moment

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 4, the media reported that the unit price of Wanhe Guanggu, a well-known real estate project in Wuhan, has been halved from more than 20,000 yuan at the time of filing to 12,500 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Luzhou, Sichuan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of now, all videos posted by bloggers about running for county party secretary or county mayor have been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 5, Japanese stocks plunged 12.4%, and Taiwan stocks fell 8.4%, hitting a record high. The topic #A-share performance is the best in the world# became a hot search on that day, triggering ridicule from netizens. Netizens replied, "It has been falling for many years, and you still have the nerve to say that."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 5, Lianyungang, Jiangsu. A woman posted a video to report Cui Dezhi, the leader of the Haizhou District Petition Bureau, under her real name, saying that he had beaten her husband, and published a video of her husband being beaten. As of now, the video of the report posted by the woman has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 5 (Released) Baoding, Hebei. A blogger named "Xiao Ma Ge" who has long been monitoring law enforcement officers found that the urban management had detained a vendor's sign on the roadside. The blogger asked the urban management to show their law enforcement certificates and penalty notices. Finally, with the help of the blogger, the vendor got his things back. The vendor said, "(The urban management) always bullies people. How hard it is for ordinary people to live now!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 5 (Released) Yulin, Shaanxi. A man posted a video to report that Jia Yu, vice chairman of the Zizhou County Federation of Industry and Commerce, had impersonated him to go to school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 3, Xiang Ligang, the founder of Feixiang.com, posted a message saying, "If there is someone with Ma Xiangyu's personality in our company, I will definitely fire him. We must not let such a person make the company a mess." As of now, this post has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was circulated online that the topics of law papers cannot involve criminal compliance, source of litigation management, proactive judicial practice, and equal protection of private enterprises. Some netizens said that they have received internal notifications.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 5, the situation of the student protest in Bangladesh took a major turn. Prime Minister Hasina announced her resignation and fled to India with her sister on a Bangladesh Air Force helicopter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The victorious students stormed into Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's residence and laid on her bed

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 4, Zhang Weiwei, a distinguished professor at Fudan University, won this year's Higher Education Scientific Research Achievement Award for his book This is China: China's Power Going to the World.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
He Guangwei, a famous blogger, revealed that an 83-year-old man was fined 10,000 yuan by the Zhengzhou High-tech Zone People's Court for insulting a judge for three hours, and was required to pay the fine before August 5. 
In response, He Guangwei said, "Can the three-hour video of insulting the judge be made public? And does this 83-year-old man have 10,000 yuan?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Yunnan netizen posted a photo of the local government distributing a "central farmland protection subsidy" of only RMB 1.6. Another netizen from Guangxi said that he only received RMB 955 for a total of more than 20 mu of land, which was half less than in previous years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A recording of a phone call was circulated online. When faced with questions, Lake responded, "How did I violate my conscience? Did I give her money? She volunteered." According to Upstream News on August 5, Lake was taken away for investigation six months ago for suspected duty-related crimes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 16, during the student protests in Bangladesh, police fired tear gas and used batons to disperse the protesting students. During this period, Abu Sayyed was left alone, facing the gun with his arms open.
Finally, the police shot Abu Sayyed, and he became the first victim of the protest.
The image of Abu facing death inspired and encouraged more and more Bangladeshis to take to the streets. In order to commemorate him, the students named the intersection where he died after him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A Taobao seller said that his store suffered a large-scale deposit fraud. A large number of accounts used the mechanism of applying for compensation for delayed delivery to defraud the seller's deposit. The Internet is also full of various "compensation" tutorials and recruitment advertisements. The problem could not be effectively handled by reporting to the police or contacting Taobao customer service.
On social media, a large number of Taobao sellers said that they had encountered the same fraud experience.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Bangladesh Army Chief General Waq-Uz Zaman made a televised address to the nation, confirming that Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina had resigned and announcing the formation of an interim government.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 2, the Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development: Accelerate the construction of regular housing physical examinations, housing insurance, and housing pension systems.
Netizens responded, "Everyone will need a physical examination in the future, once a week, 20 yuan each time" and "Doctor, I want to make an appointment for my house"

name: 李老师不是你老师
